record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 980
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 980 -- (Senate - July 20, 2007)

[Page: S9646]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 980 is at the desk and due for a second reading. Is that right?
Mr. President, it is my understanding the clerk is going to report the matter.

record.chair: The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 980) to provide collective bargaining rights for public safety officers employed by States or their political subdivisions.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings at this time.

record.chair: The bill will be placed on the calendar.
